DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective observational study assess incidence hemoglobin cycle chronic kidney disease ( stage 3 , 4 , 5 ) patient renal anemia treat Mircera ( methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta ) . Data collect patient 9-month treatment period .
DOC.brief_title: A Study MIRCERA Intrapetient Variability Hemoglobin Levels Patients With Chronic Renal Anemia ( RIVAL )
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /= 18 year age Chronic kidney disease predialysis ( stage 3 4 ) dialysis Renal anemia treat Mircera accord label least 9 month date sign informed consent Participation interventional clinical trial within retrospective observation period Contraindications Mircera administration per label judge investigator
